help.intro: AppManager can open Oracle Cloud (OCI) ports automatically by updating your VCN Security List ingress rules.
help.needs_api_key_note: (already handled by your server‚Äôs ~/.oci/config and key file)
help.needs_compartment_vcn_note: so it can find the correct security list
help.where_user: User OCID: OCI Console ‚Üí User Settings
help.where_tenancy: Tenancy OCID: OCI Console ‚Üí Tenancy Details
help.where_region: Region: top-right region selector in OCI Console
help.where_fingerprint: API key fingerprint: OCI Console ‚Üí User ‚Üí API Keys
help.where_compartment: Compartment OCID: OCI Console ‚Üí Identity ‚Üí Compartments
help.where_vcn: VCN OCID: OCI Console ‚Üí Networking ‚Üí Virtual Cloud Networks
help.nsg_note: Note: If your instance uses a Network Security Group (NSG), you may also need NSG ingress rules.
